taxonomy.description: Category taxonomy for extension discovery. Each category has a stable key, display name, and description.

categories.name: Custom Providers
categories.description: Connect Pi to alternative LLM backends (OpenAI, local models, GitLab Duo, etc.)

categories.name: Additional Tools
categories.description: Extend Pi's built-in toolset with new capabilities

categories.name: Automation & Hooks
categories.description: Lifecycle hooks, auto-commit, session management, scheduled tasks

categories.name: Git & Version Control
categories.description: Git workflows, branch management, checkpoints, commit helpers

categories.name: UI & Rendering
categories.description: Custom headers, footers, overlays, editors, themes, message renderers

categories.name: Security & Policy
categories.description: Guards, permission gates, protected paths, audit tools

categories.name: Games & Fun
categories.description: Terminal games and entertainment (snake, space invaders, doom)

categories.name: DevOps & Infrastructure
categories.description: SSH, Docker, sandbox environments, shell integration
